body:
Hi Burin- I remember we had a discussion about this before the last release. I don't know about the video but in general you should be able to setPt and setBack with Honeybee. I can't check the file right now but I will get back to this discussion soon. Looks like a bug to me > ([https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/286](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/286))

Thanks!

Mostapha
